attributes.action: SUPPORT THE CAPTIVE ANIMALS PROTECTION SOCIETY.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hi There,
Would it be possible whether you could give all the support you can in regards to Banning Elephants from performing in circus's. I have mentioned this also to my local MP in Taunton.
These elephants are ill and one of them is blind.
I am doing all I can to help.
I would be so grateful if you could step in with any support.
Many Thanks.
Theodora Poole.
